addressBody: River Garden 308 building, Ikh Mongol street, 11 khoroo, Khan-Uul district, Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia
aboutTapatripContent:
Tapatrip Agency LLC is a subsidiary of Tapatrip LLC and was established by VMC Group LLC. Since 2007, Tapatrip Agency LLC has been providing air ticket selling services to its customers and VMC Group LLC has been offering information technology products and services since 2012.

We provide a variety of adventurous travel services to customer that includes purchasing airline tickets to every location of the world, offering 1 million hotels in 195 countries of the world. The customers who choose us can get services and information in their mother languages and 24/7 services will be provided in English and Chinese. Through expanding of operation the branches are established in 55 countries, as a result, the customers can contact a service provider in the same time zone.

The Tapatrip platform is operated by Tapatrip LLC with state registration number 6125867. Agency holds all required local and international permission and certificates for tourism.
termsConditionsContent:
General terms

  • Tapatrip.com, Tapatrip mobile application (hereinafter referred to as Tapatrip), is the official property of “TAPATRIP” LLC. The terms of this service govern the relationship between customers who use the Tapatrip website and mobile application for online ticket booking, hotel reservations, and travel purchases. 

  • The Customer will be entitled to make purchases and receive services through Tapatrip upon acceptance and confirmation of the terms and conditions. 

  • Text, graphics, logos, and all other content published in Tapatrip are certified in accordance with Mongolian Intellectual Property Law and applicable international law.

Customer rights and obligations

  • The customer has the right to purchase tickets at the market price on the international ticket booking system through Tapatrip. 

  • The customer can receive flight information and his booking information and collect the announced discounts and promotions from Tapatrip. 

  • Users of Tapatrip must be at least 18 years old and legally liable. 

  • The client is fully responsible for the accuracy of the passenger information (Surname, Firstname, Gender, Phone Number, Passport Information, Email Address). Tapatrip will not be held responsible if the customer enters incorrect or incomplete information. 

  • The client is responsible for visa issues of the country of destination. 

  • The user is fully responsible for the security of the information, not to pass on the login name and password to third parties, close the browser after logging out, not pass the phone to anyone when logging in to the mobile application. 

  • The customer is fully responsible for the security of their information, customer should not pass their login name and password to third parties, log out and close the browser, not to pass the phone while logged into the mobile application. Tapatrip will not be liable for any damages caused by the cases mentioned above. 

Tapatrip’s rights and obligations 

  • Tapatrip is responsible for selling flight tickets, hotels and tours at market prices on international tickets, airports, and travel booking systems.  

  • Tapatrip reserves the right to make any changes to the structure, content, format, and design of the service at any time, and the changes will take effect from the moment of publication. The terms are considered accepted if the customer uses them after the change has been made. 

  • Tapatrip can contact the customer to provide payment information, claim unpaid bills, and cancel in non-payment. 

  • Tapatrip reserves the right to change and update the terms of service as necessary. Changes to the Terms of Service will be notified immediately via the customer's registered email address. 

  • Customer personal information is used only to respond to customer requests, alert service updates, and contact customers. 

  • Tapatrip reserves the right to restrict or block access right of the customer without prior notice if the customer violates the terms of service, made orders using other people's or false information, and acts in a way that could harm Tapatrip. 

  • Tapatrip is responsible for saving and securing the customer's personal information, passwords, and purchase history. 

  • If Tapatrip considers that the customer's debit/credit card, cash, bank transaction is fraudulent, the company has the right to have the transaction checked by the bank or law enforcement. 

Payment Terms

  • Customers have the option to pay by Bank transfer, Card or Cash. 

  • Tapatrip Agency LLC will not be liable for any issues arising from the cancellation of the order due to non-payment on time. 

  • The exchange rate of the ticket booking system changes every day so that the ticket price may vary slightly depending on the payment period. 

Booking /Ticket refund/ Changing terms

  • After logging in to Tapatrip, you can view your booking status and additional information related to your booking from the “My Orders” menu. 

  • Your booking will be confirmed upon payment and Tapatrip will automatically cancel an unpaid booking within the specified time. 

  • Ticket refunding, booking cancellation, date changes you can contact us directly through 7515 4444 24/7 

  • For ticket refunds, booking cancellations, or date changes, you can call Tapatrip at 7515 4444 for 24/7. 

Other terms

  • The airline has the right to cancel or delay the flight due to weather or other force majeure, and Tapatrip is not responsible for this. 

  • Suppose a Mongolian citizen under the age of 18 travels abroad with a person other than his/her parents or legal guardians. In that case, a notarized power of attorney is required between the parent and the legal guardian to cross the border. Any ticket dispute that violates this provision Tapatrip will not be liable. 

  • If you are travelling on a travel visa, we recommend you book a return ticket. If you buy a one-way ticket, you may be detained at the border. Therefore, we are not responsible for this and may refuse to issue a one-way ticket. 

  • Depending on your passport type, you will need a visa for the country you are planning to travel to or transit, so please get verified information about the visa from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. http://consul.mn/07visan.php 

  • Follow these tips to travel without visa and customs violations: 

  • Travel with the same airline 

  • Choose a transit flight through as large an airport as possible with a transit hall. 

  • Travel with a two-way ticket on a tourist visa 

  • If you are a passenger flying to the following cities in the Philippines and Japan via Busan, South Korea, you will need to check-in at the Korean border and board your next flight, and a valid Korean visa is required! 

  • Philippines (CEBU (CEB) and ANGELES MABALACAT (CRK))  

  • Japan (OKINAWA (OKA) and KITAKYUSHU (KKJ))  

  • It is not possible to enter Korea with a Japanese visa but with a Korean visa. 

  • Please note that a Korean visa is required if you enter Seoul (Korea) via Narita Airport (Japan) on your way back from the United States !!! 

  • When traveling to a country (eg, UB-SEOUL-WASHINGTON), we would like to warn you not to fly through the transit country if you have lived illegally in that country. We cannot check the problems before issuing the ticket, so Tapatrip is not responsible for any inconvenience.  

  • If you choose to fly to a third country through many Chinese cities, please do not fly through the following towns. 

  • FUZHOU (FOC) / HUANGSHAN (TXN) / MUDANJIANG (MDG) / SHENZHEN (SZX) / YANJI (YNJ) 

  • URUMQI(if more than URC-2 hours) 

  • Please note that you may need a Chinese visa if your transit time is more than 24 hours when traveling through one or more Chinese cities to travel to a third country. 

  • Please note that you will need a transit visa if you are flying through an airport without a transit section, even if you are a student or permanent resident in a European country. 

  • The International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) is starting to abolish extended passports, so we recommend that you order a new passport and travel with a not extended passport to avoid the risk. 

Dispute resolution

  • The parties shall attempt to resolve any dispute arising out of or relating to this contract through negotiations. If the matter is not resolved by negotiation, the dispute shall be finalized under the laws of Mongolia.
privacyPolicyContent:
Guarantee 

Tapatrip Agency LLC prioritizes the confidentiality of customer information through the website www.tapatrip.com and the Tapatrip mobile application (hereinafter referred to as Tapatrip) and ensures the inviolability of data at all levels. By becoming a Tapatrip customer, you agree to the following privacy guarantees. 

Customer Personal Data 

Information entered during the straight search and order will be stored securely on our platform. We will use the information provided by the customer only on terms that are useful to the customer, such as responding to customer requests, offering flights, stations, and travel that meets the customer's needs with the help of artificial intelligence, and contacting the customer to provide some necessary information. 

Information security 

The Tapatrip platform host is based on cloud computing that meets all standards for information security. Personal information shall not be disclosed to others under any circumstances other than under the formal requirements of the law enforcement agency. Meantime, to ensure the security of customer’s information, customers need to prevent loss of username and password.  

Changes 

We reserve the right to change the above-mentioned privacy policy without notice, and the customer is obliged to review the latest version of the terms of service of the service provider.
faqContent:
1.  Does your company charge an additional fee on airline tickets?

We do not charge any surcharges to the price set by the airlines because we are the official ticketing agent.

2. Why do airlines have different prices for the same destination?

The prices announced on the flight vary depending on the ticket conditions (refundable ticket, interchangeable, non-refundable, etc.), duration (15 days, 21 days, 1 month, 3 months, 1 year, etc.), etc. There are also discounts for some destinations and some airlines. / eg: seniors discount, family discount, student discount, youth discount, special needs discount, etc./

3. Where and how can I get the detailed information after purchasing a ticket?

You can contact us at + 976-75154444 for more information.

4. Will my bookings be confirmed immediately?

Once you have entered the full details of the passengers, you will be able to purchase the ticket by paying by Card, Qpay, HiPay, Bank Transfer, etc. After 1-5 minutes, the ticket will be confirmed. If you close the payment option window and do not pay by the due date, your order will be canceled.

5. What are acceptable forms of payment?

In our online ticket sales platform, you can pay by any bank card,  Qpay, pay by bank transfer, or pay in any of the available forms such as HiPay.

6. When I transferred my payment to the Bank, I wrote the payment details or amount incorrectly. What to do?

Your account transactions are automatically verified, so automatic verification will not be performed if you enter the amount or payment details incorrectly. In this case, you can call 7515 4444 to check and confirm the transaction with help of our online travel advisor.

7. What should you do now that you have placed the payment?

After payment, Ticket information will be sent to the email address you entered in your booking, and this email will contain all the ticket information. Additional information will be provided to you by phone or email. / Luggage, flight schedule, the information provided by Airline, etc./

8. How can I contact you, if I am living abroad?

You can contact us at 7515 4444, Facebook Tapatrip, or crm@tapatrip.com.

9. How long does it take to get a refund after requesting a refund?

After you request a refund, we will send a request to the airline. The transaction will be made to your account as soon as your payment is received from Airlines. So it takes 2-3 weeks.

10. What documents are required to get a refund?

You will not be required to provide documentation when you request for refund. Please note that a passport is required when you contact an online assistant for a refund.

11. Can I have an unannounced ticket refund on my behalf?

You only can remove your seat and return it after notifying us. Therefore, it is not possible to make a refund without notifying you.

12. Can someone else pick up the ticket refund?

You can come and get the refund after you have a notarized power of attorney.

13. What should I do when the flight schedule changes?

As soon as the flight schedule is changed, we will contact the passengers immediately. In the event that a passenger on a transit flight fails to make the next flight, arrangements shall be made for the transfer to the next flight in accordance with the airline's instructions.

14. What if the flight is delayed due to the weather?

Although the airline is not responsible for natural disasters, airlines tries to minimize damage to passengers. Depending on the circumstances, the decision will be made in accordance with the instructions provided by the airline.

15. What if I miss boarding the next flight during a transit flight?

If the passenger is late for the flight, the passenger will be responsible for all risks and fees. If it is not the passenger's fault, we will act quickly in the situation and transfer you to the next flight.
